attributes.action: To ban Parents, Family and Friends from teaching learner drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned Approved Driving Instructors, demand that untrained and 
unqualified persons such as Relatives, Family Friends, be Banned from 
giving Driving Instruction.
As Driving Instructors, we will be required to undertake Continual 
Professional Development Training, to improve the level of Instruction we 
give, to raise the Level of Road safety on our Roads and to raise the 
perception of Driving Instructors in the Public's Eye.  Most Relatives or 
Friends, normally have no Formal Training, are unable to cope with the High Stress Levels and run a greater risk of being involved in Traffic 
Accidents, due to their lack of understanding and of course, the lack of Dual Controls.
  We spend vast amounts of money on training as well as time spent studying 
and sit Rigorous exams to qualify, We Pay this Government a Fee to stay on 
their Register, with the threat of loss of livelihood if we DO NOT PAY. Yet they allow any Tom, Dick or Harry to teach this skill with no training, which makes a total mockery of what we have to go through to qualify and to stay on the register.                                                                     We demand this Government STOP all Parents, Friends and Relatives giving Driving Instruction.
